column6: • Spurred by revenge, Angela races to meet Enchantress's endgame as the gates of Faerie are wrenched open! • The dead walk and speak (and tell terrible jokes), and Kieron and Kody Chamberlain lead the revels, as Angela embarks on the Wild Hunt for Serah's soul!
column8: | writer:Marguerite Bennett | writer:Kieron Gillen | penciller (cover):Stephanie Hans
